020import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.Datable;
021import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.StorageConnector;
022import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.StorageEngine;
023
024import java.util.HashMap;
025import java.util.Map;
026
027/**
028 * YAML
029 *
030 * @author creatorfromhell
031 * @since 0.1.2.0
032 */
033public class YAML implements StorageEngine {
034
035  protected final Map<Class<?>, Datable<?>> datables = new HashMap<>();
036
037  public YAML() {
038  }
039
040  /**
041   * The name of this engine.
042   *
043   * @return The engine name.
044   */
045  @Override
046  public String name() {
047    return "yaml";
048  }
049
050  /**
051   * Called after the connection is initialized, so we can do any actions that need done immediately
052   * after connecting.
053   *
054   * @param connector The {@link StorageConnector connector} used for initialization.
055   */
056  @Override
057  public void initialize(StorageConnector<?> connector) {
058
059  }
060
061  /**
062   * Used to reset all data for this engine.
063   *
064   * @param connector The storage connector to use for this transaction.
065   */
066  @Override
067  public void reset(StorageConnector<?> connector) {
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * Used to back up all data in the database for this engine.
072   *
073   * @param connector The storage connector to use for this transaction.
074   */
075  @Override
076  public void backup(StorageConnector<?> connector) {
077
078  }
079
080  /**
081   * Used to get the {@link Datable} classes for this engine.
082   *
083   * @return A map with the datables.
084   */
085  @Override
086  public Map<Class<?>, Datable<?>> datables() {
087    return datables;
088  }
089}
